page.title: 02Family Life (age 5) Class 2
page.content: When we get up we get dressed and have breakfast. Then my Dad goes to work at Salwick and my Mum takes us to school. School starts at 9.05. First we have an assembly in the hall and then we go into our classroom to do our lessons. We have our dinner at school. The other day it was fish and chips. At the end of school Mum comes to meet us and we go home for tea. If it is fine my sister and I play out on our bikes. When Dad comes home he has tea and we watch television. Mum hears us read and then I go to bed. On Sunday Mum cooks bacon and eggs for breakfast. My sister and I go to Sunday School in the morning. After dinner we sometimes go to Stanley Park or on to the beach at Blackpool. One Sunday we went to Beacon Fell Country Park in the car.
